ComicInfo.Characters: Ace Johnson,Gwen Moffett,Space Queen,Detective Kearnes,Professor Hagerty
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T19:58:34 [Issue ID 4000-542843] urn:comicvine:4000-542843 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev78 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-08 18:36:21. [Issue ID 542843]
ComicInfo.Summary: Saved by Detective Kearnes from certain death at the end of the last issue, Ace is restrained as Gwen is taken captive. Now Ace must find a way to save his lesbian friend and convince the paramilitary fanatics that she is not a zombie like the others. Additionally, the Professor claims that Ace possesses the one thing that can end the lesbian zombie apocalypse for good; but Ace is unwilling to admit it. Will Ace and Gwen be able to escape the town and find help?
